title: Loading failures
body:
So today I was playing some games, and I just won 2 of them. Neither of them gave me any IP or a ranking because the champion mastery tab was loading, pretty much the spinning wheel of death. So I have gotten no champion mastery +up or and IP from these last two games. It is not just me, I played these 2 games with my friends and the exact same thing happened to them.

EDIT: I _did_ get IP from them, but there was no champion mastery update. It seems to be a bug with champion mastery, and not IP.

replies.body: Ay sir, I am also having the same problem. Rito, get on it.

We're looking into this now! We've got a [boards thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/elnfK8uM-44-mastery-not-loading-after-game) up with more information as well as a notice on our [server status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)

same but only for the mastery value, the mastery circle keeps on circling without ever showing any  mastery value, here is a picture :
[click](http://s24.postimg.org/t64gk71tx/veigar.jpg)
